pullRequest.title: Consume Automation Logger & Add rule to dump MSAL logs to its own file
pullRequest.bodyText:
Depends on AzureAD/microsoft-authentication-library-common-for-android#1138
The file be named like test_name-msal.log

commit.message: Consume separate logging rules for msal and automation
Disable logcat log for msal (during ui automation) - just dump to file only
Use file appender to dump msal logs during automation

nodes.bodyText: nit: if you converted the level first, or used a function to do it, there would only be one call to msialfilelogappender.
